title: This week's headlines from PlayStation: 🚪 🛜 🧟 💥 🏯

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/mandragora/

Whether you favor brute strength, devastating magic, or something in between, your journey in Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree is yours to shape. Take a closer look at the playstyles of two Classes in this Feature Spotlight: Vanguard and Spellbinder.

Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree is a dark fantasy action RPG coming to PlayStation®5 on April 17, 2025. Battle monsters across an expansive story, craft powerful upgrades, and explore this vast, ruined world before Entropy consumes it. Add it to your wishlist today!

#ps5 #ps5games #mandragora
title: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree - Feature Spotlight: Class Playstyles | PS5 Games
